allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Replace Stripe with Razorpay and add demo mode

- Switch payment provider from Stripe to Razorpay for Indian market
- Add webhook-free payment verification flow
- Add demo dashboard with sample analytics data
- Update pricing to INR \(₹1,499 Starter, ₹3,999 Pro\)
- Add shop domain input for Judge.me OAuth flow
- Add /api/v1/demo/* endpoints for testing without auth
- Add /api/v1/billing/verify and /sync endpoints

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
